GetClassType.name: GetClassType
GetClassType.description: Returns a type of the ApiBlockLvlSdt class.

SetLock.name: SetLock
SetLock.description: Sets the lock to the current block text content control: "contentLocked" - content cannot be edited. "sdtContentLocked" - content cannot be edited and the container cannot be deleted. "sdtLocked" - the container cannot be deleted.

params.name: sLockType
params.description: The type of the lock applied to the block text content control.

GetLock.name: GetLock
GetLock.description: Returns the lock type of the current container.

SetTag.name: SetTag
SetTag.description: Sets the tag attribute to the current container.

params.name: sTag
params.description: The tag which will be added to the current container.

GetTag.name: GetTag
GetTag.description: Returns the tag attribute for the current container.

SetLabel.name: SetLabel
SetLabel.description: Sets the label attribute to the current container.

params.name: sLabel
params.description: The label which will be added to the current container. Can be a positive or negative integer from -2147483647 to 2147483647.

GetLabel.name: GetLabel
GetLabel.description: Returns the label attribute for the current container.

SetAlias.name: SetAlias
SetAlias.description: Sets the alias attribute to the current container.

params.name: sAlias
params.description: The alias which will be added to the current container.

GetAlias.name: GetAlias
GetAlias.description: Returns the alias attribute for the current container.

GetContent.name: GetContent
GetContent.description: Returns the content of the current container.

GetAllContentControls.name: GetAllContentControls
GetAllContentControls.description: Returns a collection of content control objects in the current content control.

GetAllParagraphs.name: GetAllParagraphs
GetAllParagraphs.description: Returns a collection of paragraph objects in the current content control.

GetAllTablesOnPage.name: GetAllTablesOnPage
GetAllTablesOnPage.description: Returns a collection of tables on a given absolute page. This method can be a little bit slow, because it runs the document calculation process to arrange tables on the specified page.

RemoveAllElements.name: RemoveAllElements
RemoveAllElements.description: Clears the contents from the current content control.

Delete.name: Delete
Delete.description: Removes a content control and its content. If keepContent is true, the content is not deleted.

params.name: keepContent
params.description: Specifies if the content will be deleted or not.

SetTextPr.name: SetTextPr
SetTextPr.description: Applies text settings to the content of the content control.

params.name: oTextPr
params.description: The properties that will be set to the content of the content control.

GetAllDrawingObjects.name: GetAllDrawingObjects
GetAllDrawingObjects.description: Returns a collection of drawing objects in the current content control.

GetParentContentControl.name: GetParentContentControl
GetParentContentControl.description: Returns a content control that contains the current content control.

GetParentTable.name: GetParentTable
GetParentTable.description: Returns a table that contains the current content control.

GetParentTableCell.name: GetParentTableCell
GetParentTableCell.description: Returns a table cell that contains the current content control.

Push.name: Push
Push.description: Pushes a paragraph or a table or a block content control to actually add it to the current container.

params.name: oElement
params.description: The type of the element which will be pushed to the current container.

AddElement.name: AddElement
AddElement.description: Adds a paragraph or a table or a block content control to the current container.

params.name: oElement
params.description: The type of the element which will be added to the current container.

AddText.name: AddText
AddText.description: Adds a text to the current content control.

params.name: sText
params.description: The text which will be added to the content control.

GetRange.name: GetRange
GetRange.description: Returns a Range object that represents the part of the document contained in the specified content control.

Search.name: Search
Search.description: Searches for a scope of a content control object. The search results are a collection of ApiRange objects.

GetPlaceholderText.name: GetPlaceholderText
GetPlaceholderText.description: Returns the placeholder text from the current content control.

SetPlaceholderText.name: SetPlaceholderText
SetPlaceholderText.description: Sets the placeholder text to the current content control.

params.name: sText
params.description: The text that will be set to the current content control.

GetPosInParent.name: GetPosInParent
GetPosInParent.description: Returns the content control position in its parent element.

ReplaceByElement.name: ReplaceByElement
ReplaceByElement.description: Replaces the current content control with a new element.

params.name: oElement
params.description: The element to replace the current content control with.

ToJSON.name: ToJSON
ToJSON.description: Converts the ApiBlockLvlSdt object into the JSON object.

comment:
/**
	 * Class representing a container for the document content.
	 * @constructor
	 */
description: Class representing a container for the document content.
